jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Gojek’s cloud infrastructure is constantly growing to adapt to the limitless amount of new services we provide to millions of people in Indonesia and Southeast Asia. We run thousands of instances spread across our hybrid infrastructure between Datacenter, Google Cloud and Amazon Web Services.

One of our core focus is to build a platform that can empower our product engineers to the next level. Our platform should be able to assist them in delivering products that can handle massive scale in a consistent and reliable manner. Reach us out if you are eager to work with us to develop critical platforms that will be used across Gojek.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Design and develop cloud platform to empower the engineering team of one of the world’s fastest-growing unicorns to develop with scale and extensibility in mind
  • Collaborate together to work on open source projects
  • Pair with team members on functional and nonfunctional requirements and spread design philosophy and goals across the team.
  • Building and managing fully automated build/test/deployment environments
  • Own the full lifecycle of feature development from design through testing and release
  • Continuously improve code quality, product execution, and customer delight
  • Collaborate with the security team to improve the security of our platform
  • You should understand the user and their behavior and will continuously contribute to making their experience better with each release

• Have hands-on experience in designing, developing, testing and deploying the application in either Golang, Ruby, Rust, Python or other languages
  • Have hands-on experience developing in Linux / OSX environment
  • An innate desire to deliver and a strong sense of accountability for your work
  • Continuously refactor applications and architectures to maintain high-quality levels
  • Basic understanding of Infrastructure As Code such as Terraform
  • Basic knowledge of configuration management systems such as Puppet, Chef, Salt, or Ansible
  • Basic understanding of container technologies such as CGroups, Docker, Rocket, LXC, etc
  • Basic understanding of containers orchestrators and schedulers (Kubernetes, LXD, etc)
